import React from 'react'; // Data for College Clubs (Categorized) const clubCategories = [ { category: "Cultural Clubs", clubs: [ "Chaitanya Samskruthi", "Chaitanya Geethi and Chaitanya Vaadya", "Chaitanya Laasya", "Chaitanya Chaaya", "Chaitanya Srujana", "Communicando", "Toastmasters", "CBIT MUN", "Transcendent", "Writers and Poets Club", "CBIT Photography Club", ], image: "/images/cultural.jpg", // Placeholder image for the category }, { category: "Sports Clubs", clubs: ["Chaitanya Kreeda", "E-Sports"], image: "/images/sports.jpg", }, { category: "Chaitanya Seva Clubs", clubs: [ "NSS", "ELC", "Chaitanya Spandana", "EWB", "EDC", "Chaitanya Parivrita", "Chaitanya Svaasthya", "Chaitanya Suraksha", "Chaitanya Sattva", "CBIT Talks", ], image: "/images/seva.jpg", }, { category: "Technical Clubs", clubs: [ "Chaitanya Astra", "Praheti Racing", "CBIT Developer Student Club", "HiCon (Hackiton Earlier)", "COSC (CBIT Open Source Community)", "CCC (CBIT Cybersecurity Club)", "Neural Nexus CBIT", "IGBC (Indian Green Building Council)", "Ham Radio Club", "BBCC", "Ramanujan Maths Club (RMC)", "IEEE", "Robotics & Innovation", "SATARC", "Yuva Aarav", "NexIoT", "Computer Society of India (CSI)", "CEA (Civil Engineering Association)", ], image: "/images/technical.jpg", }, ]; function About() { return (
{/* About Eventify */}

About Eventify

Eventify is a club management platform designed to streamline event organization, resource booking, and communication. It simplifies managing college events by providing an intuitive interface for organizers and attendees alike.


Our Mission

Our mission is to reduce the manual effort in managing events and foster greater student engagement by providing an interactive, secure, and scalable platform.



{/* College Clubs Section */}

Our College Clubs

{clubCategories.map((category, index) => (
{/* Category Image */} {/* Category Title */}

{category.category}

{/* List of Clubs */}
    {category.clubs.map((club, idx) => (
  • {club}
    • ))}
))}
); } export default About;
